name: Fire and Flame
description:
Fire and Flame  is a metroidvania-like game, which was made within a university project of the SRH Hochschule-Heidelberg

- Story -

In a far away galaxy exists a planet named Cremos, this planet consists of metals, crystals and for the most part of carbon. In this environment, which is hostile to most other civilizations, one civilization has managed to survive and build a thriving culture. They proudly called themselves the Cremorians, they are peaceful and respectful of each other and other races. However, the resources on Cremos are very valuable and Cremos lies in the center of an important trade zone between a lot of powerful civilizations. So one day the ruler, a strong technomancer, of the planet Cyberius, a technological race of conquerors and warriors, decides to invade Cremos with his army of machinic warriors to use Cremos resources and build an army that can defeat even the greatest of civilizations. The army of Cremos was not prepared for the attack, the only person who can still defeat the Technomancer is Magmos, the last Crematorium guard.

- Gameplay -

Fire and Flame is a Metroidvania-like game in which you'll control the main character Magmos, your objective being to defeat the Technomancer that has attacked your planet Cremos. To do this, you'll control Magmos through different levels, in which you'll have to platform and fight against enemies. There are 3 bosses that you'll have to defeat to unlock new abilities for Magmos. After you have all the abilities it's time to fight the Technomancer, do you have what it takes?

- Content -
  • 8 Levels
  • 3 Obtainable Abilities
  • 7 Enemies with unique behaviors
  • 4 Bossfights
FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT
